title: SDH Chandigarh Notification 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Various Specialist Posts
description: Sub District Hospital (SDH Chandigarh) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Specialist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/MS, DND, and Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the SDH Chandigarh Notification 2026 . Here we mentioned more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address below...
